widget.name: Nuxyz
widget.description:
Nuxyz is a combination of goodies: • It's a social network • Eagerly protects your privacy • Accessible from both PC and mobile • Gathers all your favorite news for you • A great place to publish your news to your people • Offline-oriented so you can get to it when YOU want to • Helps you save your precious web items, and share them with the exact people you want to • Lets you "feed" groups so you can send a message to several groups without having to copy-paste it • Brings the control over your network back into your hands • Places your items on the map, and lets you find items on the map • An awesome replacement for sending emails - especially the ones that contain a link
Nuxyz makes it easy for you to share the things that excite you, with the exact people you want to. It's like sending an email, but it's so much better. We take your privacy seriously. We're a bunch of paranoids. We know and appreciate how important this is.
